job_purpose: Provide technical support for a software application in the Retail Industry in Western Australia
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Support a software application for the Retail Industry in Western Australia
Assist with POS systems and SQL basics
required_qualifications: Minimum 2 years experience with Windows 10/11 administration and troubleshooting
Certificate IV in Information Technology or equivalent technical qualification
Experience with POS systems, SQL basics, and remote desktop support tools
company_details: Retail IT Solutions Pty Ltd specializes in providing innovative IT solutions tailored for the Retail Industry in Western Australia. The company values teamwork, communication, and technical expertise in delivering top-notch support services.
